survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Airport Parking Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experiences with airport parking services, including ease of use, cost, and overall satisfaction to help improve service quality.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use airport parking services when traveling?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use airport parking services when traveling?

questions.question_text: Which of the following airport parking services have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every time I travel', 'Often', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an option for those who haven't used any services.

script.question_text: Which of the following airport parking services have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every time I travel', 'Often', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the airport parking facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option except 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the airport parking facilities?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option except 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for airport parking services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for airport parking services?
